NYSAPI.get_all_data_state_wide[source]

NYSAPI.get_all_data_state_wide(min_date='2020-03-15')

Gets state wide aggregated data.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ny = NYSAPI()
df = ny.get_all_data_state_wide()
df.head()
